data.title: Hetalia Archives
data.text:
Kokoro Tanaka

たなかこころ Other names: Kazutada Tanaka (夛中一忠)

Date of Birth: May 21st, 1974

Age: 47

Hometown: Osaka, Japan Work on Hetalia Cast role: Poland, Latvia Crew role: Seiyū Career highlights ANN entry: 81366 IMDb profile: 3284235

Kokoro Tanaka voice work

Kokoro Tanaka (たなかこころ, Tanaka Kokoro?), formerly credited as Kazutada Tanaka (夛中一忠, Tanaka Kazutada?), is the seiyū who voices Poland and Latvia in Hetalia.
